attributes.action: Allow home owners to stop company mail for prior tenants coming to their home.
attributes.background: Despite informing companies that a tenant no longer resides at my address they continue to post mail up to two years which has to be returned to sender.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to address this problem.
